Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Yes, you can upload offline conversions to track and optimize your campaigns. This allows you to measure the effectiveness of your ads in driving offline actions, such as in-store purchases or phone calls. If you need detailed instructions on how to do this, feel free to check out our Reporting Guide here: [Reporting Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18088532505485-Reporting-Guide). Let me know if you have any other questions!
This guide doesn't really answer my question. The guide is just about how to generate reports

I apologize for the confusion. For uploading offline conversions, you would typically use a tracking platform or service that supports this feature. Could you let me know which tracking platform you're using? I can provide more specific guidance based on that.

For uploading offline conversions with Everflow, you can follow their specific integration steps. Unfortunately, I don't have a direct guide for Everflow in our knowledge base. I recommend checking Everflow's support documentation or reaching out to their support team for detailed instructions. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
